alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Outflow winds from storms up in Lincoln county will impact portions of northern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary pushing across Otero and Kiowa counties. This outflow will bring strong gusty winds to 40 to 50 mph across parts of Otero, Kiowa, Bent and Crowley counties through 445 PM. There is a possibility that this boundary may cause new thunderstorms to develop behind it as the boundary pushes southward across the highway 50 corridor. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arlington and Blue Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
